author: lgo
msg: Follow-up to r23342: fix the build on Windows.
(open_directory): move the declaration of db to the front of the function.

author: lundblad
msg: Avoid renaming a file twice when installing working files.
Especially on remote filesystems, rename can be a very expensive operation.
(file_xfer_under_path): When translating a file to expanded form, don't
go via a temporary file, since svn_subst_copy_and_translate3 already

author: cmpilato
msg: (build): Add some commentary about how actions are derived from the
input parameters.  Interpret (valid-URL, invalid-REVNUM) as a directory

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a new --root-url (-U) option to MUCC to minimize the action syntax
(usage, main): Add support for new --root-url (-U) option.
